mapper.select: SELECT R.REG_NUM , M.NICKNAME , R.CATEGORY , R.VIEWS , G.GAMETITLE , R.GATHERING_ID , R.TITLE , R.FUN_SCORE , R.REVIEW_SCORE , R.GAME_SCORE , R.REVIEW_DETAIL , R.GOOD , R.DEL , R.CREATE_USER , TO_CHAR(R.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATEDATE , R.UPDATE_USER , R.UPDATE_DATE FROM REVIEW R , MEMBER M , GAME G WHERE R.CREATE_USER = M.USERID AND R.GNUM = G.GNUM AND G.GAMETITLE = G.GAMETITLE
